title: Teacher Capacity Building Program through Online Science Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Improving ability to design and implement science education projects applicable in real school settings

learning_goals: Develop instructional design that improves learners' scientific inquiry skills by over 80% through project-based learning
Share learning materials with peers and provide feedback at least twice weekly using smartphone-based collaboration tools
Over 90% of learners rate the perceived usefulness (PU) of science project design at 4 points or higher (on a 5-point scale) at course completion

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
